name: The Day Before (enderlost_studios)
description:
The day before the war broke out.
The day before is a quick and simple arcade shooter. Take control of a state-of-the-art hover craft and use your arsenal of weapons to bread light in the dark. A range of enemies will try their hand at taking you down, from cars to boats. Take them out, win the day and save the worrrllddddd.
This game was made as part of the QUT game clubs. Arcade game jam
CONTROLS
- W A S D = move
- Mouse = move
- mouse buttons = shoot guns

shooter #action #strategy #scifi #retro #arcade
